channel.title: [PI]Magic Based Korasi Special Attack[PI]

item.title: [PI]Magic Based Korasi Special Attack[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

How do I make my special attack for my korasi sword magic based instead of melee based?

case 19784: // Korasi's Sword - 634 Model if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(1248); } if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].gfx100(1248); } c.gfx100(1247); c.startAnimation(4000); c.specAccuracy = 5.00; c.specDamage = 2.00; c.ssSpec = true; c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;

Read full topic
